name: ADVentura - El loco - El Viudo
additionalNotes: EL LOCO, Edicion Especial ADV 2017, assembled by McKay & A. Turrent. Aromas of fresh leather and white pepper are revealed. As the smoke progresses, beautiful notes of saffron and cedar wood are added, with a fine mineral touch. El Loco's tobacco was fermented more gently, at a lower temperature and for twice as long as usual. The ADventura El loco El Viudo is a Robusto module with aromas of fresh leather and white pepper, accompanied by surprising notes of saffron and cedar wood and a fine mineral touch. It is a mild cigar with a 98 Criollo wrapper and binder from Mexico, and a Mexican and Nicaraguan filler.
